name: Can Giuoc to Can Gio Day Ride
description: A leisurely day trip heading south of HCMC down to a beautiful beach for a delicious lunch as you take in the views of the beach and the local people digging for clams. Plenty of peacefully countryside riding and two ferry rides that are sure to impress. The perfect trip for people looking for a one day jaunt into the countryside. Depending on the ferry times, the total trip duration is between 7-8 hours.
